row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.SUDO_EXECUTION
:if &UC4RB_UNIX_PROC_FORCE# = "YES" : set &force# = "-9" :else : set &force# = "" :endif
:if &UC4RB_UNIX_PROC_ID# <> "" kill &force# &UC4RB_UNIX_PROC_ID# rc=$? if [ $rc -eq 0 ]; then echo "num_sent:1" else echo "num_killed:0" fi exit $rc :endif
:if &UC4RB_UNIX_PROC_PATTERN# <> "" list=`ps -Ao pid,args` echo "$list" | awk ' BEGIN { sent = 0; killed = 0; err = 0 } /&UC4RB_UNIX_PROC_PATTERN#/ { if (system("kill &force# " $1) == 0) killed++; else err++; sent++; } END { print "num_sent:"sent; print "num_killed:"killed; exit err; }' :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX exit :endif
:if &UC4RB_UNIX_PROC_LIST# <> "" killed=0 : set &count# = 0 : set &hnd# = prep_process_var(&UC4RB_UNIX_PROC_LIST#) : process &hnd# : set &count# = add(&count#, 1) : set &pid# = get_process_line(&hnd#, 1) if kill &force# &pid#; then killed=`expr $killed + 1` fi : endprocess echo num_sent:&count# echo num_killed:$killed :endif

row.post_process: :SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*:*", "COL=DELIMITER", "DELIMITER=*:*") :process &hnd# : set &key# = get_process_line(&hnd#, 1) : set &val# = get_process_line(&hnd#, 2) : if &key# = "num_sent" : pset &UC4RB_OUT_PROC_SIG_NUM# = &val# : endif : if &key# = "num_killed" : pset &UC4RB_OUT_PROC_KILLED_NUM# = &val# : endif :endprocess
